title: New bug since update
body:
Got into ranked champion select......finishes select and suppose to laod to game.....didnt load to game i close the client and reload it....says im in game.....but cant connect to game....i wasnt the only one in champion select whos game didnt load in the ranked game....RIP lp plz fix riot

(http://imgur.com/zlnfo2i)

replies.body: just popped into loading screen idk if that will be bugged aswell
Yeah the timer hits zero and doesn't go in to load in screen :/
This just happened to me - was in a ranked queue and champ select got to 0 - still stuck in champ select. too worried to close and reopen. what to do?
Yeah Happened to me in a Norms Game, I tried to close and reopen the client but it says I'm in game as well and also cant connect :/

Don't know if related but we just finished a ranked game and are now stuck in a ghost game after game ended. No stat screen and when skipped didnt show up in match history and didn't count towards placements (we won). Relogged and it says still in game but will not reconnect to anything.
Just happened to me and my mates in a norms, cant connect to game and stuck in champ select
